item.title: MS-20 Filter
item.description: The MS-20 is a synthesizer made by Korg and it has a pretty nice sounding filter. Ren√© Schmitz has made a popular clone of it and has schematics avavailable on his site. There is also a version designed by Kassutronics that adds a pot for blending between low/highpass and a drive knob to attenuate the input signal.
